TITLE: Episode 125 - Who Owns the Word of God? (with Ryan Burgett)
DESCRIPTION: Who owns the Bible? I don't know if you are aware of this, but the Bible you have next to your bed is most likely copyrighted and you need to get permission to use excepts in your writings or projects. Minister and our friend, Ryan Burgett, comes back on the show to discuss this reality and how we might overcome it.
